sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'

import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'
import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'
import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'
import ProductForm from '../product-form/ProductForm'



const ProductCard = props => {

    return (
        <Col lg={3} md={6}>
            <Card as="article">
                <Card.Img variant="top" src={props.img} />
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title>{props.name}</Card.Title>
                    <Link to={`/products/oneProduct/${props._id}`} className="btn btn-dark btn-block btn-sm">Details</Link>
                    <Button onClick={() => this.handleModal(true)}  className="btn btn-dark btn-block btn-sm">Delete</Button>

                    <Modal show={this.state.modalShow} onHide={() => this.handleModal(false)}>
                        <Modal.Body>
                            <ProductForm finishProductPost={this.finishProductPost} closeModal={() => this.handleModal(false)} />
                        </Modal.Body>
                    </Modal>


                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
        </Col>
    )
}



export default ProductCard
